alert.note: Alert for Lee; Phillips (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 01 at 3:05PM CST until February 04 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total ice accumulations of one tenth to four tenths of an inch possible and total sleet accumulations of up two tenths of inch. * WHERE...Portions of North Mississippi, West Tennessee and East Arkansas. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
